summary.para: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves a value indicating if the specified profile is supported for video encoding.

For single GPU operation, set this to zero. If there are multiple GPU nodes, set a bit to identify the node (the device's physical adapter) to which the command queue applies. Each bit in the mask corresponds to a single node. Only 1 bit may be set.
A member of the enumeration specifying the codec for which the supported profile level is being queried.
A structure specifying the profile for which support is being queried.
Receives a boolean value indicating if the specified profile is supported for the specified codec.
Output field that receives the minimum supported level for the selected codec and profile if supported.
Output field that receives the maximum supported level for the selected codec and profile if supported.
